alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 7:40PM CDT until May 11 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Easter, or 7 miles south of Hereford, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hereford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
